related_questions.question: How to create PR for services in SAP?
related_questions.title: Enter transaction code ME51N in the SD Master Data Screen.
list: Or, you can also navigate to the following path Logistics -> Materials Management -> Purchasing -> Purchase Requisition -> Create.
Then click on Save, and the Purchase Requisition will be created.

related_questions.question: What is ME52N in SAP?
related_questions.snippet: ME52N is a transaction code in SAP that allows users to change purchase requisitions. With this tool, you can modify details such as item quantities, delivery dates, and account assignments. By using ME52N, you streamline the procurement process and enhance order management within your organization.
